snippet.title: Kotlin Messenger 08: User to User Messaging
snippet.description:
Sending messages to different users is a must have feature for a chat application. In today's lesson, I'll show you how you can build this out by introducing a different node inside of Firebase Database. Enjoy!

Podcasts Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Podcasts
